SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM (
SELECT ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID, MEMB_ID, TARGET_ADDR, TARGET_LONX, TARGET_LATY, USE_YN, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as REG_DT, NAME, ROAD_JIBUN FROM TB_ARRIVAL_ALARM_SET WHERE 1=1 AND MEMB_ID = #{membId} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM >= (#{startPosition}+1) AND RNUM < (#{startPosition}+1) + #{reqCount}

SELECT ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID, MEMB_ID, TARGET_ADDR, TARGET_LONX, TARGET_LATY, USE_YN, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as REG_DT FROM TB_ARRIVAL_ALARM_SET WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND MEMB_ID = #{membId} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
SELECT ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID, ARRIVAL_ALARM_RCPT_ID, MEMB_ID, RCPT_NM, RCPT_CTN FROM TB_ARRIVAL_ALARM_RCPT WHERE 1=1 AND MEMB_ID = #{membId} AND ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID =#{arrivalAlarmId}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_ARRIVAL_ALARM_SET TAAS USING DUAL ON ( TAAS.MEMB_ID = #{membId} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TARGET_ADDR =#{targetAddr}, TARGET_LONX =#{targetLonx}, TARGET_LATY =#{targetLaty}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, UPD_ID = 'SYSTEM', UPD_DT = SYSDATE , NAME = #{name}, ROAD_JIBUN = #{roadjibun, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID, MEMB_ID, TARGET_ADDR, TARGET_LONX, TARGET_LATY, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT, NAME , ROAD_JIBUN ) VALUES ( #{arrivalAlarmId}, #{membId}, #{targetAddr}, #{targetLonx}, #{targetLaty}, #{useYn}, 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE, #{name}, #{roadjibun, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

UPDATE TB_ARRIVAL_ALARM_SET SET TARGET_ADDR =#{targetAddr}, TARGET_LONX =#{targetLonx}, TARGET_LATY =#{targetLaty}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, UPD_ID = 'SYSTEM', UPD_DT = SYSDATE, NAME =#{name}, ROAD_JIBUN = #{roadjibun, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1=1

MERGE INTO TB_ARRIVAL_ALARM_RCPT TAAR USING ( SELECT #{membId} MEMB_ID, #{arrivalAlarmId} ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID, #{rcptCtn} RCPT_CTN FROM DUAL ) VAL ON ( TAAR.MEMB_ID=VAL.MEMB_ID AND TAAR.ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID =VAL.ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID AND TAAR.RCPT_CTN =VAL.RCPT_CTN ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET RCPT_NM =#{rcptNm}, UPD_ID = 'SYSTEM', UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ARRIVAL_ALARM_ID, ARRIVAL_ALARM_RCPT_ID, MEMB_ID, RCPT_NM, RCPT_CTN, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{arrivalAlarmId}, #{arrivalAlarmRcptId}, #{membId}, #{rcptNm}, #{rcptCtn}, 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE )
